name: Understanding the sustainability drivers in overseas markets
description: What is driving the sustainability agenda in global markets? Understanding the global corporate, regulatory, ratings and economic landscape and what this means for the built environment.

speakers.name: James Drinkwater
speakers.occupation: Senior Policy Advisor, UK Green Building Council

speakers.name: James Rowlands
speakers.occupation: Global Research and Policy Project Manager, RICS

speakers.name: Simon Cox
speakers.occupation: Vice President Project Management and UK Sustainability Officer, Prologis
